title: Best of The Herd for Mar 09, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 09, 2020
description:
Doug Gottlieb filling in for Colin

LeBron was as much like MJ as he has ever been this weekend

Dak going from most underpaid to most overpaid

Be careful about crowing the Lakers after one great weekend

Guest: Ric Bucher, FOX Sports NBA Analyst talks about the Lakers, Clippers, NBA MVP and defends Kyrie Irving


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
